xwikidoc.name: InvitationLanguagePack
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
#---------------------------------------------------------------------- # Translations for Invitation Application #---------------------------------------------------------------------- admin.invitation=Invitation Application xe.invitation.heading=Invitation Messenger xe.invitation.userIsReportedSpammer=A message which you sent was reported as spam and your privilege to send mail has suspended pending investigation, we apologize for the inconvenience. xe.invitation.returnToMainPage=Return to the main page xe.invitation.configInfo=This document contains configuration for the [[invitation application>>XWiki.Invitation]] xe.invitation.emailContainerInfo=This document contains email messages for the [[invitation application>>XWiki.Invitation]] xe.invitation.onlyMembersCanSendMail=Sorry, only members of this wiki can send mail. xe.invitation.youAreAMemberOfOtherWiki=You seem to be a member of {0} which is a different wiki. xe.invitation.toLabel=To: xe.invitation.subjectLabel=Subject: xe.invitation.contentLabel=Message: xe.invitation.previewLabel=Preview: xe.invitation.sendMail.errorWhileSending=An error has occured while sending the message. xe.invitation.sendMail.addMessageSaveComment=Added Email Message. xe.invitation.sendMail.composeAnotherMessageLink=Compose another message xe.invitation.sendMail.success=Your message has been sent. xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.heading=Inspect sent message xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.noMessageFound=No message by this id was found. xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.reportedAsSpam=Reported as spam xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.waitingToBeInvestigated=Waiting to be investigated xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.viewMessage=View Message xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.sentBy=Sent by: xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.markThisMessageAsInvestigated=Mark this message as investigated. xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.status=Message Status xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.viewMessagesSentByUsers=View messages sent by users xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.sender=Sender xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.subject=Subject xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.memo=Notes: xe.invitation.reportSpam.heading=Report Abuse xe.invitation.reportSpam.noMessageFound=There was no message found by the given ID. Maybe an administrator deleted the message from our system. xe.invitation.reportSpam.success=Your report has been logged and the situation will be investigated as soon as possible, we apologize for the inconvenience. xe.invitation.reportSpam.reportSaveComment=Reported message as spam. xe.invitation.handleSpam.noMessageFound=No message found by that id. xe.invitation.handleSpam.reportHandledSaveComment=Investigated spam report. xe.invitation.handleSpam.memo=[[{0}]] has investigated this incident. xe.invitation.displayMessage.anAddressesIsInvalid=One of the given email addresses is invalid and will not be sent to. xe.invitation.displayMessage.someAddressesAreInvalid={0} of the given email addresses are invalid and will not be sent to. xe.invitation.displayMessage.theAddressIsInvalid=The email address given is invalid and will not be sent to. xe.invitation.displayForm.sendMail=Send Mail xe.invitation.displayForm.backToEdit=Back To Edit xe.invitation.displayForm.preview=Preview xe.invitation.adminTools.heading=Administrative Tools xe.invitation.adminTools.configureLink=Click here to configure the friend inviter xe.invitation.adminTools.displayAllOldMessagesLink=Click here see the list of already sent mail messages xe.invitation.configuration.smtpHeading=SMTP Settings:
#---------------------------------------------------------------------- # Translations for LiveValidation javascript validator #---------------------------------------------------------------------- platform.validation.valid=Ok. platform.validation.fieldMandatory=This Field is mandatory. platform.validation.invalidEmailAddress=Invalid email address.
#---------------------------------------------------------------------- # Translations for Classes #----------------------------------------------------------------------
# XWiki.InvitationMail (Invitation Application) Email XObject XWiki.InvitationMail_messageID=Email message identifier XWiki.InvitationMail_recipients=Email addresses to whom this message was sent XWiki.InvitationMail_sendingUser=User who sent the message XWiki.InvitationMail_subjectLine=Subject line XWiki.InvitationMail_messageBody=Message content XWiki.InvitationMail_reportedAsSpam=Was this message reported as spam XWiki.InvitationMail_handledBy=Spam report investigated by
# XWiki.Invitation (Invitation application) Configuration XWiki.Invitation_from_address=Admin email address (messages will list this as their from address) XWiki.Invitation_smtp_server_password=Smtp password XWiki.Invitation_smtp_server_username=Smtp username XWiki.Invitation_smtp_port=Smtp port XWiki.Invitation_smtp_server=Smtp server host name XWiki.Invitation_javamail_extra_props=Javamail extra properties XWiki.Invitation_subjectLineTemplate=Email subject line template XWiki.Invitation_messageBodyTemplate=Email message body template XWiki.Invitation_emailClass=Email message XClass XWiki.Invitation_emailContainer=Document containing email XObjects XWiki.Invitation_emailRegex=Regular expression for validating email addresses XWiki.Invitation_allowUsersOfOtherWikis=Allow users of other wikis to send mail XWiki.Invitation_sendBcc=Always send mail to multiple addresses using blind carbon copy
